messages.message: Ya this is something we don't support yet in the new view. We can work on fixing it March release Cc: @Travis
Does this mean that there is no way to check the ibdoc output in new view?
I’ll have to take a look.
Not for docx files unfortunately. We can work on a fix and push to dogfood asap. Do we need to cherry pick it to prod?

One thing that you can try atm is if your flow generates a batch.ibflowresults file, you can click on that. In the new review screen url add `old=true` and then you should be able to access the older results screen. From there you might be able to click on each of the records to access the old screen. It’s very round about unfortunately
@Yash Aggarwal @Pranjal Rai Let's use the old flag for now to keep moving.. Meanwhile Eric/Travis can look into the fix
The other idea is to output a merge_file step and open the out.ibocr, That always goes to the old view.
Got it. Will use that, Thanks!
